sentences: Nozy studied at the Royal Conservatory of Brussels and at the Lemmens Institute in Leuven.

In 1970 he was Pro Civitate laureate of the International Gaudeamus Competition for Contemporary Music in Rotterdam in 1973, the Stravinsky Seminar for young conductors, organized by the National Opera in 1975.
For the academic year 1973 to 1974 he was a visiting lecturer and teacher at the University of North Texas College of Music, the same year that Jim Riggs began teaching saxophone at North Texas.
He is also chief conductor of the Royal Netherlands Army Band "Johan Willem Friso" in Assen.
Nozy has taught at the Maastricht Academy of Music and the Lemmens Institute in Leuven.
